summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2032 for the improvement of Twenty-second Avenue North, from East Thomas Street to East Mercer Street, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues therein named, all in the City of Seattle, by constructing water mains therein of proper dimensions and materials, together with all gates, tees, crosses, fire hydrants and other necessary appurtenances for the proper water service and fire protection of said district; under Ordinance No. 20437, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
